comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content: This was an remains a very controversial incident in Canadian military history. Critics of Gen. Arthur Currie question the decision to fight for the liberation of Mons when the Armistice was imminent. The last Canadian soldier died 2 minutes before the 11:00 a.m. end of fighting. See www.hardscrabble.ca/?q=taxonomy/term/33
